name: Friday NIght Funkin' Corruption mod port for Chromebooks

description:
NOTICE: I AM PORTING THESE SO PEOPLE CAN ACCSESS THEM WHO NORMALY COULD'NT, IF YOU ARE THE CREATOR OF THIS MOD, YOU HAVE FULL PERMISSION TO TAKE THIS DOWN.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRab81QtbYFqbnkvhYC9G4A

ONLY WEEK 2 NORMAL IS IN THIS DEMO

based on Friday Night Funkin: Foned.

no spookyd2 sprite due to how foned was coded.
